long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
applies over the top motion themes to every page on the internet. make websites fun and whimsical.
as an added bonus, while making the internet fun, also makes the web less addicting by adding friction to web usage that breaks addictive cycles and makes you want to get offline and do something else!
